messages.title: Why I am backing Tom Corbin
messages.content: Tom has a strong track record for standing up for the people of Salisbury and South Wiltshire. He has campaigned tirelessly to protect the NHS.

messages.title: Safer Communities
messages.content: The local LibDems and Tories supported the closing of Salisbury's Police Station. Labour will oppose further cuts to frontline officers. Labour will prioritise neighbourhood policing and bear down on crime and its causes.

messages.title: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis
messages.content: The NHS is in financial crisis. Labour will end health service privatisation and bring services into a secure, publicly-provided NHS. We will integrate the NHS and social care for older and disabled people, funding dignity across the board, and ensure parity for mental health services.

messages.title: Labour will build a new relationship with the EU
messages.content: Where jobs, the economy and retaining the benefits of the Single Market and the Customs Union are our priority. Where workplace rights and the environment are protected. Where EU nationals living here, can live in certainty that Brexit will not affect them.

messages.title: Tom's pledges to you
messages.content: Saving the NHS from the Tory sell off. Invest in frontline Policing. Raising Mental health awareness. Driving up the standard of living. Meeting future Housing needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Saving the NHS from the Tory sell off
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give the NHS the money needed and ensure the NHS and social care are open to services from hospital to home.
10,000 more frontline Police Officers on the beat.
Ensure that mental health is given the same priority as physical health.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Driving up the standard of living
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills, and technology.
Build more than one million new homes in five years and scrap letting fees for private renters.

mentions.candidate: Tom has campaigned tirelessly to protect the NHS.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will build a new relationship with the EU.
issues.economy: Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills, and technology.

housing.content: Meeting future Housing needs: Build more than one million new homes in five years and scrap letting fees for private renters.
